account.title: Account
account.dangerZoneDescription: These actions are irreversible. Please proceed with caution.

hero.title: Find the perfect
hero.subtitle: Connect with talented freelancers and get your projects done quickly and efficiently on Beamly.

categories.title: Categories
categories.subtitle: Find services in top categories to help you achieve your goals

features.subtitle: We're revolutionizing the freelance marketplace with these unique features

qualityWork.title: Quality Work
qualityWork.description: Find the highest quality services and talents with our strict verification process.

zeroCommission.title: Zero Commission
zeroCommission.description: Keep more of what you earn with our zero commission policy for freelancers.

securePayments.title: Secure Payments
securePayments.description: Your payments are protected with our secure payment system and escrow service.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: Get help anytime with our dedicated customer support team available round the clock.

aiMatching.title: AI-Powered Matching
aiMatching.description: Our advanced AI algorithm matches you with the perfect freelancer or client.

disputeResolution.title: Dispute Resolution
disputeResolution.description: Fair and transparent dispute resolution process to protect both parties.

globalTalent.title: Global Talent Pool
globalTalent.description: Access to talented professionals from over 180 countries worldwide.

flexiblePayments.title: Flexible Payments
flexiblePayments.description: Multiple payment options including crypto, wire transfer, and local methods.

howItWorks.title: How
howItWorks.subtitle: Get your projects done in 4 simple steps

step1.title: Create an Account
step1.description: Sign up for free and complete your profile to get started.

step2.title: Discover Services
step2.description: Browse through thousands of services or post a request.

step3.title: Hire Freelancers
step3.description: Choose the perfect freelancer for your project and collaborate.

step4.title: Complete Project
step4.description: Approve the work and release payment when satisfied.

step1.title: Build Your Profile
step1.description: Showcase your skills, portfolio, and experience.

step2.title: Browse Jobs
step2.description: Find projects that match your expertise and interests.

step3.title: Submit Proposals
step3.description: Send compelling proposals to win clients.

step4.title: Get Paid
step4.description: Complete work and receive secure payments.

testimonials.title: What Our
testimonials.subtitle: Join thousands of satisfied clients and freelancers
testimonials.sarah: Beamly has transformed how we find creative talent. The quality of work and speed of delivery has been exceptional.
testimonials.michael: As a startup founder, Beamly has been invaluable. I've found amazing developers and designers who've helped bring my vision to life.
testimonials.jessica: The zero commission policy is a game-changer! I've been able to grow my freelance business significantly since joining Beamly.

cta.description: Join Beamly today and connect with top freelancers from around the world. Whether you need a quick task or a complex project, we've got you covered.

login.subtitle: Log in to your account to continue
